Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.lang

Class LanguageManager

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.lang.LanguageManager
public class LanguageManager extends Object
Platform-agnostic language manager.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LanguageManager(dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.platform.Platform platform, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.ConfigManager configManager)
    Create a language manager bound to a specific platform.
    LanguageManager(Object platformOrPlugin, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.ConfigManager configManager)
    Create a language manager, resolving a Platform from the provided platform or legacy plugin instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • LanguageManager

      public LanguageManager(Object platformOrPlugin, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.ConfigManager configManager)
      Create a language manager, resolving a Platform from the provided platform or legacy plugin instance.
      Parameters:
      platformOrPlugin - platform abstraction or Bukkit plugin
      configManager - config manager for loading language files

    • LanguageManager

      public LanguageManager(dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.platform.Platform platform, dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.config.ConfigManager configManager)
      Create a language manager bound to a specific platform.
      Parameters:
      platform - platform abstraction
      configManager - config manager for loading language files

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(String defaultLanguage)
      Initialise language manager and load default language (plus fallback if different).
      Parameters:
      defaultLanguage - language code to load first

    • loadLanguage

      public boolean loadLanguage(String languageCode)
      Load a language file into memory.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language code to load
      Returns:
      true if successfully loaded

    • setLanguage

      public boolean setLanguage(String languageCode)
      Switch the current language for the manager.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language code to set
      Returns:
      true if language is now active

    • putCustomMessage

      public void putCustomMessage(String languageCode, String key, String value)
      Add or update a custom message for a specific language (or current language when null). Saves the language file immediately.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - target language or null for current
      key - message key
      value - message text (null removes the key)

    • setFallbackLanguage

      public void setFallbackLanguage(String languageCode)
      Set fallback language used when a key is missing in the current language.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - fallback language code

    • getAvailableLanguages

      public Set<String> getAvailableLanguages()
      List languages available on disk or already loaded.
      Returns:
      set of language codes found on disk or loaded in memory

    • getLanguageInfos

      public Map<String,LanguageInfo> getLanguageInfos()
      Get metadata for every available language.
      Returns:
      metadata for each available language

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String key)
      Resolve a message in the current language.
      Parameters:
      key - message key
      Returns:
      resolved message or key if missing

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String key, Map<String,String> placeholders)
      Resolve a message with named placeholders.
      Parameters:
      key - message key
      placeholders - placeholder map
      Returns:
      message with substitutions applied

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(String key, String... replacements)
      Resolve a message with positional replacements (name/value pairs).
      Parameters:
      key - message key
      replacements - placeholder/value pairs
      Returns:
      message with substitutions applied

    • hasMessage

      public boolean hasMessage(String key)
      Check whether the current language (or fallback) has a message for the key.
      Parameters:
      key - message key
      Returns:
      true if present

    • hasMessageForLanguage

      public boolean hasMessageForLanguage(String languageCode, String key)
      Check whether a specific language (or fallback) has a message for the key.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language to inspect
      key - message key
      Returns:
      true if present

    • getMessageForLanguage

      public String getMessageForLanguage(String languageCode, String key)
      Resolve a message for a specific language code.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language to use
      key - message key
      Returns:
      resolved message or key if missing

    • getMessageForLanguage

      public String getMessageForLanguage(String languageCode, String key, Map<String,String> placeholders)
      Resolve a message with placeholders for a specific language code.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language to use
      key - message key
      placeholders - placeholder map
      Returns:
      resolved message

    • getMessageForLanguage

      public String getMessageForLanguage(String languageCode, String key, String... replacements)
      Resolve a message with positional replacements for a specific language code.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language to use
      key - message key
      replacements - placeholder/value pairs
      Returns:
      resolved message

    • setPlayerLanguage

      public boolean setPlayerLanguage(UUID playerId, String languageCode)
      Assign a preferred language for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - player UUID
      languageCode - language code to set (null/empty clears preference)
      Returns:
      true if updated

    • setPlayerLanguage

      public boolean setPlayerLanguage(dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.platform.Audience audience, String languageCode)
      Assign a preferred language for an Audience.
      Parameters:
      audience - audience with id
      languageCode - language code to set
      Returns:
      true if updated

      Parameters:
      player - player object
      languageCode - language code to set
      Returns:
      true if updated

      Reload all loaded languages from disk.

      public void saveCustomMessages(String languageCode, Map<String,String> customMessages)
      Persist custom messages into the language file.
      Parameters:
      languageCode - language to modify
      customMessages - map of keys to values to persist
